record.field: The end rule is based on the insured age. The coverage will terminated at age of ${max_age_for_option} (included). ${"The age used is the age at subscription" if age_kind =="real" else ("The age is synchonized with the %s day of the %s month" % (given_day, given_month) if age_kind == "at_given_day_of_year" else "The age used is based on the first day of the month following the birth")}.
real : Real at_given_day_of_year : At Given Day of Year at_end_of_month : At End of Month
